Community
=========

Welcome to the TanaT community! This section contains information about contributing to the project, 
citing TanaT in your work, and connecting with other users and developers.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :hidden:
   
   changelog
   contributing
   contributors
   citing

Quick Links
-----------

   Stay up-to-date with TanaT's development: new features, 
   bug fixes, and improvements across all versions.

   Learn how to contribute code, documentation, or bug reports to TanaT. 
   Detailed guidelines for getting involved.

:doc:`citing`
   Citation information and BibTeX entries for using TanaT in your research.

----

Support and Communication
-------------------------

* `Mailing List <https://sympa.inria.fr/sympa/subscribe/tanat-community>`_ - Follow announcements and releases

* `GitLab Issues <https://gitlab.inria.fr/tanat/core/tanat/-/issues>`_ - Report bugs or request features

* `GitLab Repository <https://gitlab.inria.fr/tanat/core/tanat>`_ - Browse source code and contribute

* tanat@inria.fr - General questions or collaboration inquiries

----

Development Status
------------------

TanaT is actively developed within the `AIstroSight <https://team.inria.fr/aistrosight/>`_ Inria Team.

The development has been supported by:

* **2024-2025**: `AIRacles Chair <https://www.bernoulli-lab.fr/project/chaire-ai-racles/>`_ (Inria/APHP/CS)
* **2025-present**: `PEPR/SafePaw projet` (Government funding managed by the French National Research Agency under France 2030, reference number ANR-22-PESN-0005)

----

Milestones
~~~~~~~~~~

- **Project start:** June 2024  
- **Foundation release (v0.7.0):** August 2025  
- **Enhanced Control, Flexibility & Validation (v0.8.0):** November 2025
- **Performance & Scalability (v0.9.0):** December 2025
